column1: The Rivil was a lesser tributary of the Sirion. Its source was Rivils Well in the highlands of Dorthonion
column2: from which it flowed westward to meet the Sirion at the Fen of Serech.

column1: During the Nirnaeth Arnoediad King Turgon retreated down the Pass of Sirion. His escape was successful because Húrin and Huor formed a rearguard that used the Rivil as a defence. The host of Angband bridged the stream with the corpses of their dead. Huor was slain beside the Rivil and Húrin was captured.
